game.name: Two Worlds II - Digital Deluxe Content
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This Digital Deluxe Content for Two Worlds II contains: Artbook, Compendium, World Map, PotFF Map, Dusty Scroll Labyrinth Map, Cover Art Poster, PotFF Poster, Dragon Queen Poster, 4 Novels, Avatar Packo, five TW2 Bonus Items and three PotFF Bonus Items
game.shortDescriptionEn: This Digital Deluxe Content for Two Worlds II contains: Artbook, Compendium, World Map, PotFF Map, Dusty Scroll Labyrinth Map, Cover Art Poster, PotFF Poster, Dragon Queen Poster, 4 Novels, Avatar Packo, five TW2 Bonus Items and three PotFF Bonus Items
